backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor as a placeholder backend with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented frontend features, related files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend source files and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base stylesheet defining global design tokens and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the UserDetailsPage as the main application view.
frontend/src/features/user-details/UserD: React form component collecting first name, last name, and email with validation, error handling, and simulated submission flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module intended for future React Query hooks for backend CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining a purple-blue themed design system with typography and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application bootstrap that renders the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetailsPage.tsx: Page-level layout that wraps the UserDetailsForm in a styled card with header text and footer attribution.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, and extensive theme extensions for colors, typography, animations, and UI styling using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the goal, current features, and requirements for building a simple React + TypeScript user details form with required-field validation and Tailwind-based styling.
